basics.name: Wanjing Yang
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am a master student in computer science at University of Southern California with a passion for turning innovative ideas into reality. I'm committed to continuous learning and growth, and I'm excited to take on new challenges and opportunities in the world of software development.

education.institution: University of Southern California, Los Angeles, CA

work.company: California Institute of Acupuncture and Chinese Medicine
work.summary: Collaborated with a dynamic startup team to contribute to the full-stack development of a JPress-based website
highlights: Utilized Java programming to implement 5+ critical website functionalities and constructed backend service interfaces based on the JFinal framework, thereby enhancing our products and services
Designed and implemented visually appealing web pages using HTML and JavaScript, improving product presentation and user-friendliness
Contributed to the implementation and maintenance of a comprehensive user data security protocol using MySQL

work.summary: Contributed to a project aimed at developing a software platform for unified ecological environment management
highlights: Collaborated with clients to understand their requirements and devised effective solutions to meet their needs
Assisted in project planning and executed tasks to ensure smooth progress and delivery of the project
Facilitated communication between developers and clients to ensure requirements were clearly communicated
Coordinated with data companies to secure multiple data interfaces and transfers to support project requirements
